column2: "A story from ten years ago? Why now? Oh, fine. Hmm..."
"Ah, here's one. Ten years ago was around the time I met my Teacher. Teacher really was amazing."
"1. Stare at him."
"2. Namedrop Melrondia."
"Alright, alright, I get it. I'll tell you everything, so quit staring at me like that. Feels like Teacher is staring at me right now..."

"That name...
Did she tell you herself? Is that what you want to hear about?"
"Still, the story from ten years ago, umm..."
"Oh perfect timing. Hey, Echo! Come here!"
"What is it, Zeno? I have administrative procedures to go through, so make it quick."
"Say, do you remember anything from ten years ago?"
"Ten years ago? You kept skipping training and I kept having to scold you."
"Ah, why do you still remember that part? Never mind, thanks anyway."
"Alright, don't skip the upcoming meeting. You, make sure that Zeno sets a good example."
"I can barely recall anything from ten years ago. Whenever I try and remember, it's like a fog covers it up."
"However, there's one thing that I won't forget. Something Gettemhart and I both won't forget."

"When that Dark Falz appeared ten years ago.
Once, both of us were fighting during a civil rescue."
"I was in charge of sniping. To be honest, I was in the safest place."
"From there, I saw my comrades collapsing. All I could do was watch."

"Me, along with Gettemhart,
and the child Melphonsina,
were the only survivors."
"Ah- that's right. You told me before. You prefer Melrondria, right?"

"Gettemhart and I got lost on the
way. That's when we saw her older sister, Melphonsina, sacrifice herself to let Melrondria escape."
"After that, well, you know the rest. I threw my gun away, and Gettemhart started acting strange."
"Afterwards, Melrondria tried to become Melphonsina."

"Now that's something from your senpai's past.
Something like that. Funny, isn't it?"
"Hmm? About the Dark Falz we confronted that time?"
"I won't forget that, either. It was a terrifying and intimidating monster."
"Its appearance was like a child, playing around like nothing was wrong. Now that's not something you see every day."
"Why are you so surprised? Have you seen a Dark Falz that takes the form of a child?"
